content: Wukong, finally satisfied that MK doesn't know where the snare is, wonders aloud in front of MK why he still needs MK. Now MK has to convince Wukong that there is a good reason to let him go instead of killing him. Though it doesn't fully work, Wukong finally decides to let MK live for now. Let's write that scene with details and dialogue and include Wukong's initial thoughts.
